definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture
lit. there is heaven above, and there is 蘇杭|苏杭[Su1 Hang2] below (idiom)/fig. the beauty and affluence of Suzhou and Hangzhou is comparable with heaven
pinyin: shang4 you3 tian1 tang2 , xia4 you3 Su1 Hang2

definition: heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
to die/to enter the hall of heaven

sentences.english: For a boy of fourteen his own home is the only Paradise.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个十四岁的男孩来说，自己的家就像是个天堂。

sentences.english: Today, I am within sight of my heaven.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我望得见我的天堂了。

sentences.english: Love and knowledge, so far as they were possible, led me upward toward the heavens.
sentences.chinese: 爱和知识可能地把我向天堂提升。

sentences.english: Properties and the original Nintendo console in the front.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂原控制器的特点在前面。

sentences.english: Better to reign in hell than serve in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 宁在天堂为王，不到地狱当差。

sentences.english: If you cannot catch a bird of paradise.
sentences.chinese: 如果你无法逮住一只天堂鸟。

sentences.english: Only one of them old, the hill that was nearest to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 只有一位年老者，在离天堂最近的山坡上。

sentences.english: A group of great scientists lived in heaven after dearth.
sentences.chinese: 一群伟大的科学家死后在天堂里抓迷藏。

sentences.english: With shame and grief he dared no longer look towards that heaven where his father lived.
sentences.chinese: 愧疚悲伤令他不敢望向父亲安息的天堂。

sentences.english: With so many island paradises to visit, it's no wonder the area is so popular.
sentences.chinese: 这区有许多岛屿渡假天堂可供游访，难怪如此热门。

sentences.english: She was really in a dilemma. Will the love lead to the heaven or the hell?
sentences.chinese: 这确实让芊芊很为难，爱该走向天堂，还是逃出地狱？

sentences.english: There is no going to the Heaven in a sedan.
sentences.chinese: 从来没有坐轿子上天堂之事。

sentences.english: Look at line 183. Milton imagines Lycidas in heaven now.
sentences.chinese: 看一下183行，弥尔顿想象着利西达斯身在天堂。

sentences.english: Butter and popcorn was bound to be a match made in heaven.
sentences.chinese: 奶油加上爆米花绝对是来自天堂的绝配。

definition: heaven on Earth/nickname for the city Suzhou
holy land (of a religion)/sacred place/shrine/holy city (such as Jerusalem, Mecca etc)/center of historic interest
to rest/to go to sleep/to rest in peace/(history) Parthia
(Buddhism) Pure Land, usually refers to Amitabha Buddha's Western Pure Land of Ultimate Bliss (Sukhavati in Sanskrit)
